refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: x = distfun_gamrnd ( a , b ) x = distfun_gamrnd ( a , b , [m,n] ) x = distfun_gamrnd ( a , b , m , n )

listitem.para: a matrix of doubles, the shape parameter, a>0.
a matrix of doubles, the scale parameter, b>0.
a 1-by-1 matrix of floating point integers, the number of rows of x
a 1-by-1 matrix of floating point integers, the number of columns of x
a matrix of doubles, the random numbers, x>=0.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Generates random variablesfrom the Gamma distribution function.
Any scalar input argument is expanded to a matrix of doubles of the same size as the other input arguments.

refsection.title: Examples
